remarks:
Define conjunction ('and') of three wff's.  Definition *4.34 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 118.  This abbreviation reduces the number of parentheses and emphasizes that the order of bracketing is not important by virtue of the associative law ~ anass .  (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-1994.) 

---

 Define conjunction ('and') of 3 wff.s.  Definition *4.34 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 118.  This abbreviation reduces the number of parentheses and emphasizes that the order of bracketing is not important by virtue of the associative law ~ anass .  (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-1994.)
